ui.advanced_settings_help: This panel allows you to fine-tune the interactive elements and visual identity of your site. You can toggle special effects (spirits, constellations) and customize brand colors.

help.isInteractiveMode: Enables dynamic background effects like spirits and constellations. Best for creative storytelling.
help.showZodiac: Displays 12 signs of the zodiac in the background. Only works when Interactive Mode is ON.
help.showParticles: Adds floating light particles to the background for a more mystical atmosphere.
help.showNews: Toggles the GitHub-powered activity section on the home page.
help.isGyroEnabled: Enables parallax motion based on mobile device orientation.

ui.hub_description: Welcome to the unified creator hub. Explore our projects, media, and experiments.
ui.coming_soon_description: LuckyFields.Lab is evolving. Stay tuned for a new way to explore our creative output.

admin.login_desc: Enter password to enable Customization Mode
